title: TECT
question: What is TECT?
hint: TECT have been supporting us for the last 3 years.

possibleAnswers.label: The name of a new car

answerBlurb: Did you know that TECT provide support for local initiatives, facilities and events that bring vibrancy, connectedness, growth and economic benefits to our region. To know more visit tect.org.nz

title: Trustpower
question: What does Trustpower provide to our community?
hint: One of the answer is in the name...
answerBlurb: Did you know that Trustpower is based here in Tauranga? In fact their head office is just next door! To know more visit trustpower.co.nz

title: Xero
question: Which letter in STEM does Xero cover?
answerBlurb: Xero has been supporting us since the beginning and we are so grateful to have them as a partner. Go check out their website at xero.com/nz/

title: Zespri
question: Which fruit does Zespri sell around the world?
answerBlurb: In fact they produce 6 different kinds of kiwifruit! To know more visit zespri.com

title: BECA
question: Which STEM field does Beca cover?
answerBlurb: Beca have just celebrated their 100 years anniversary! Go check out their website at beca.com

title: Comvita
question: Which animal is working hard to help Comvita making their primary resource?
hint: They are crutial to our survival.
answerBlurb: Did you know that Comvita was created in 1974 and is now based in Paengaroa. To know more visit comvita.co.nz

title: LawVu
question: Where was the tech start up LawVu founded?
hint: You won't have to travel far from here to get to their office...
answerBlurb: LawVu is booming in New Zealand but also overseas with offices accross 6 countries. To know more visit lawvu.com

title: Toi Ohomai
question: Where does Toi Ohomai have campuses?
hint: They are in more than 4 towns in New Zealand!
answerBlurb: Crazy right!! To know more visit toiohomai.ac.nz

title: Waikato University
question: Which STEM field can you study at Waikato University?
hint: Keep in mind that there are plenty of studies options...
answerBlurb: In fact it has a campus across the road from here so go check it out on your way out! To know more visit waikato.ac.nz
